description: JSON Schema for inspection class in Elephant Lexicon

completed_date.description: The date when the inspection was completed.

completed_time.description: The time when the inspection was completed in ISO 8601 time format (HH:MM:SS or HH:MM:SS.sss).

inspection_status.description: Current status of the inspection indicating whether it has been completed and the outcome.

permit_number.description: The permit number associated with this inspection, identifying the construction or renovation permit being inspected.

requested_date.description: The date when the inspection was requested.

scheduled_date.description: The date when the inspection is scheduled to occur.

title: inspection
